search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for TextMagic SMS (textmagic.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for TextMagic SMS is located at: [https://www.textmagic.com/pricing/](https://www.textmagic.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Flexible SMS Pricing for Business Communication - Textmagic

extracted_content.content:
Pick any plan, change it later
------------------------------

Select your texting volume and try for free. Easily scale, switch, or cancel plans anytime.

Select your destination country:

![Image 1](https://www.textmagic.com/wp-content/themes/textmagic-new/assets/icons/flag/flag_placeholder.png)

United States (USD)

*   ![Image 2](https://www.textmagic.com/wp-content/themes/textmagic-new/assets/icons/flag/flag_placeholder.png)
    
    United States (USD)
    
*   ![Image 3](https://www.textmagic.com/wp-content/themes/textmagic-new/assets/icons/flag/flag_placeholder.png)
    
    United Kingdom (GBP)
    
*   ![Image 4](https://www.textmagic.com/wp-content/themes/textmagic-new/assets/icons/flag/flag_placeholder.png)
    
    Canada (USD)
    
*   ![Image 5](https://www.textmagic.com/wp-content/themes/textmagic-new/assets/icons/flag/flag_placeholder.png)
    
    Australia (AUD)

Select your texting volume:

Essential

Pay-as-you-go - ideal for businesses with occasional messaging needs or one-time campaigns.

$ 24.5

/ 500 texts

4.9c / text

1 message part is 160 plain text characters or 70 Unicode characters long.

Example: A message with 161 plain text characters will be counted as 2 texts.

Add credit when needed

With this plan, you can add credit and spend it when needed on sending messages and other services. The cost of one text message part is always 4.9c.

500 messages will cost $24.5.

1 message part is 160 plain text characters or 70 Unicode characters long.

Credit never expires

Any purchased credits remain valid indefinitely without an expiration date.

Unlimited users

Allows you to add as many users to your account as needed without extra charges.

Inbound texts are free

Receiving incoming text messages is included in the plan at no extra cost.

Texting number: $10 / month

To start texting you must buy a virtual dedicated number for an extra fee of $10 / month.

Most popular

Professional 2K

SAVE ​18%

Monthly plan with volume discounts - ideal for businesses with consistent messaging needs.

$ 80

Starts from

/ 2,000 texts / month

4c / text

1 message part is 160 plain text characters or 70 Unicode characters long.

Example: A message with 161 plain text characters will be counted as 2 texts.

Billed monthly

This plan includes a monthly prepaid credit for sending 2,000 text messages. If you exceed plan limit, it will trigger a renewal of the monthly plan.

1 message part is 160 plain text characters or 70 Unicode characters long.

Credit rolls over up to 2 months

The unused credit balance remains active for up to 2 months from the date of purchase.

**Example:** Unused credit bought on the 15th of January will expire on the 1st of March (after 1.5 months). Unused credit bought on the 1st of March will expire on the 1st of May (after 2 months).

Unlimited users

Allows you to add as many users to your account as needed without extra charges.

Inbound texts are free

Receiving incoming text messages is included in the plan at no extra cost.

Texting number included

This plan includes one texting number at no additional cost.

Connect 2K

Connect your messaging providerBy connecting your preferred CPaaS provider (Communication Platform as a Service), like **Twilio, Vonage, or Sinch** with Textmagic, you can use all of Textmagic's features, while benefiting from your provider's routes, and rates.

, like Twilio or Vonage, - for businesses with high texting volumes.

$ 20

Starts from

/ 2,000 texts / month

1c / text via CPaaS

1c price applies **only to texts sent from connected CPaaS provider numbers**. Texts from Textmagic numbers are billed at the standard rate.

1 message part is 160 plain text characters or 70 Unicode characters long.

Billed monthly

This plan includes a monthly prepaid credit for sending 2,000 text messages via a CPaaS provider integration. If you exceed plan limit, it will trigger a renewal of the monthly plan.

Standard fees apply for using other Textmagic services.

Credit rolls over up to 2 months

The unused credit balance remains active for up to 2 months from the date of purchase.

**Example:** Unused credit bought on the 15th of January will expire on the 1st of March (after 1.5 months). Unused credit bought on the 1st of March will expire on the 1st of May (after 2 months).

Unlimited users

Allows you to add as many users to your account as needed without extra charges.

Inbound texts are free

Receiving incoming text messages is included in the plan at no extra cost.

Texting numbers from CPaaS

Your existing texting numbers will be connected via API from your CPaaS provider at no extra cost.

Billing and plans FAQ
---------------------

Haven’t found what you were looking for? [Contact us now](https://support.textmagic.com/contact-us/)

The best plan depends on your messaging volume and specific needs. All Textmagic plans are prepaid and include a set number of credits that can be used for texting and other services. Below are the key advantages and differences of each plan.

*   **Essential** This **pay-as-you-go plan** is ideal for occasional texting with no commitments. It includes the prepaid credit that can be used for any Textmagic service at a standard rate. To start texting, you'll need to purchase a virtual number for an additional monthly fee, compared to the Professional plan. Your unused credit will never expire.
*   **Professional** This **monthly plan** is perfect for predictable monthly messaging costs with volume discounts in your registration country. By subscribing to this plan, you will benefit from discounted message prices, one free virtual number, and free inbound texts. Any unused credits will roll over and remain active for up to 2 months from the date of purchase.
*   **Connect** This **monthly plan** is suitable for customers who have a CPaaS account (Twilio, Vonage, Sinch, or Bandwidth) and want to integrate it with the Textmagic platform. With no code 2-minute quick setup, you can immediately start using all Textmagic web app features and its user-friendly interface while enjoying the lower messaging costs of your existing CPaaS provider. Any unused credits will roll over and remain active for up to 2 months from the date of purchase.

Yes, you can switch between plans whenever you wish simply by visiting the [Plans](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/monthly-plans) page and selecting the desired messaging volume and plan.  You can **Downgrade to the pay-as-you-go** (Essential plan), **Cancel** your current Professional or Connect plan, or select a new monthly plan that better suits your messaging volume.

**BYOC** (Bring Your Own CPaaS) is a native no-code integration by Textmagic that lets businesses connect their CPaaS provider and link existing virtual numbers with the Textmagic platform. **CPaaS** (Communications Platform as a Service) is a cloud-based communication provider for texting and calling. Textmagic BYOC supports Twilio, Vonage, Sinch, and Bandwidth. **The Connect plan** is suitable only for those who prefer to connect their existing CPaaS provider instead of using the Textmagic default SMS gateway to dispatch text messages.

Textmagic does not store PayPal, credit, or debit card details on this website. All payment data is securely stored and processed by a third-party PCI-compliant payment gateway - **Stripe**.

Yes, you can remove your payment methods from the [billing overview](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/billing-overview) page at any time.  **Essential plan:** If you remove the payment method, auto-recharge will be disabled, and you will need to top up manually. **Professional and Connect plans:**  If you remove the payment method, your monthly plan will remain active until the next renewal. After that, you will be downgraded automatically to the Essential plan with a disabled auto-recharge.

**UK customers** All customers from the UK will be charged VAT 20%. **EU customers** To avoid paying VAT, you need to enter your organization's registered VAT number into the Stripe portal while making the payment. Once you do this, you will no longer be charged VAT. **US customers** Textmagic applies sales tax to purchases in accordance with state nexus thresholds. The applicable tax rate varies based on your geographical region and is added to the purchase price. If you are eligible for a tax exemption, please **send your exemption certificate** to [support@textmagic.com](mailto:support@textmagic.com) **before making the payment.**

**Essential plan:** With this pay-as-you-go plan, unused credit never expires and remains active forever.  **Professional** and **Connect** plans: With these monthly plans, unused credit rolls over for up to 2 months. **Example**: The unused credit bought on January 15th will expire on March 1st (after 1.5 months), and the unused credit bought on March 1st will expire on May 1st (after 2 months).

**Essential plan:** If auto-recharge is enabled, your account will automatically be topped up when the balance falls too low, according to the selected [auto-recharge settings](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/billing-overview). Otherwise, you will need to manually buy credit each time to ensure uninterrupted service. **Profession** and **Connect** plans: The monthly plan will be renewed automatically if your balance falls critically low (depending on the selected plan) to ensure uninterrupted service.  The [billing overview](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/billing-overview) page allows you to manage your plans, billing details, auto-recharge settings, and review your costs summary.

To receive a refund for the unused SMS credit, please [contact us](https://support.textmagic.com/contact-us/). Please include your name, company name, email address, and the reason why you are requesting a refund.

Yes, you can [disable auto-recharge](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/billing-overview) on the Essential plan anytime you wish. We highly recommend you use auto-recharge if:

*   You have a [dedicated virtual number](https://app.textmagic.com/services/sender-settings/numbers) subscription, [Sender ID](https://app.textmagic.com/services/sender-settings/sender-ids), or an active [10DLC campaign](https://app.textmagic.com/services/sender-settings/10dlc). 
*   You use a call forwarding service.
*   Your service operations are very dependent on the SMS service.

To stop the Professional/Connect plan renewal, Go to the [Plans](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/monthly-plans) page and Click “Downgrade to pay-as-you-go” or “Cancel plan.”

Yes, discounts are available with the Professional monthly plans, which offer savings of up to 49%, and the Connect monthly plans, which offer savings of 80% compared to the Essential pay-as-you-go plan. You can switch between plans or upgrade whenever you want simply by visiting the [Plans](https://app.textmagic.com/accounts/monthly-plans) page.

Affordable pay-as-you-go and subscription plans for business communication. Select your texting volume and try for free. Easily scale, switch, or cancel plans anytime.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: TextMagic SMS offers flexible pricing plans tailored to different business needs, including pay-as-you-go and subscription models.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Pay-as-you-go plan for occasional messaging needs.
Monthly plan with volume discounts for consistent messaging needs.
features: Credit rolls over up to 2 months

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Monthly plan for high texting volumes via CPaaS integration.
features: Credit rolls over up to 2 months

promotional_offers.offer_description: Save 18% on monthly plan with volume discounts.

additional_fees.fee_description: Monthly fee for a virtual dedicated number.
